General Edmund Allenby and wife, Mabel [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lord and Lady Allenby]

Lieutenant General Philip Chetwode describing the Fall of Jerusalem to group of dignitaries, Duke of Connaught in cap [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lieutenant General Sir Philip Chetwode, Allenby’s second in command, pointing across the Dead Sea toward Arabia. Next to him, Lieutenant General Sir Harry Chevel, Australian general in command of the Anzac mountain division; Lieutenant General Sir Edwin Bulfin, Major General Sir john Shea, whose troops captured Jerusalem. The Duke of Connaught, wearing cap; the Anglican Bishop of Jerusalem and Allenby, the Commander-in-Chief.]

Lieutenant General Philip Chetwode describing the Fall of Jerusalem to group of dignitaries, Duke of Connaught in cap [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lieutenant General Sir Philip Chetwode, Allenby’s second in command, pointing across the Dead Sea toward Arabia. Next to him, Lieutenant General Sir Harry Chevel, Australian general in command of the Anzac mountain division; Lieutenant General Sir Edwin Bulfin, Major General Sir john Shea, whose troops captured Jerusalem. The Duke of Connaught, wearing cap; the Anglican Bishop of Jerusalem and Allenby, the Commander-in-Chief.]
